No. 817,

Misc.

Burge v. Texas. Emmett Colvin, Jr., for petitioner. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General of Texas, Nola White, First Assistant Attorney General, Hawthorne Phillips, Executive Assistant Attorney General, and Sam L. Jones, Jr., and Robert C. Flowers, Assistant Attorneys General, for respondent.

Ct. Crim. App. Tex. Certiorari denied.
